<hr/>

### üéØ The Problem: The High Cost of Manual RFP Responses

Responding to B2B Requests for Proposals (RFPs) is a high-stakes, resource-intensive process. For most Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs), it involves:
-   **Tedious Manual Labor:** Hours spent reading dense documents to extract key requirements.
-   **High Risk of Errors:** Missing a single compliance clause can lead to disqualification.
-   **Slow Turnaround:** Technical, pricing, and sales teams operate in silos, slowing down the entire process.
-   **Wasted Effort:** Significant time is often spent on bids that the company is not eligible for or is unlikely to win.

The result is a slow, expensive, and opaque process that limits the number of qualified bids a company can submit.

### ‚ú® The Solution: TenderFlow AI

**TenderFlow** is an enterprise-grade system designed to automate, accelerate, and audit the entire RFP response lifecycle. It employs a sophisticated **multi-agent AI system**, powered by the Google Gemini API, to transform unstructured RFP documents into actionable, strategic reports in minutes, not days.

Our system goes beyond simple data extraction. It reasons on compliance, identifies risks, and flags assumptions, empowering your team to make faster, safer, and more strategic bidding decisions.

<br>

## üöÄ Key Features

<table>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th width="25%">Feature</th>
      <th width="45%">Description</th>
      <th width="30%">Business Impact</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td><strong>ü§ñ Agentic AI Pipeline</strong></td>
      <td>A multi-agent system where specialized AI agents (Parsing, Sales, Technical, Pricing) collaborate to analyze an RFP from start to finish.</td>
      <td><em>Reduces manual effort by over 90%, allowing teams to focus on strategy instead of tedious data entry.</em></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td><strong>‚úîÔ∏è Technical Compliance Analysis</strong></td>
      <td>Automatically matches RFP technical specs against your product inventory (SKUs) and flags specific standards (e.g., IS:14314) for human verification.</td>
      <td><em>Increases bid accuracy and trust by ensuring every technical standard is explicitly addressed and verified.</em></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td><strong>üìã Eligibility Snapshot</strong></td>
      <td>Instantly evaluates critical business clauses like turnover requirements, supplier classifications, and payment terms, presenting a pass/warn/fail snapshot.</td>
      <td><em>Prevents wasted effort on non-qualifying bids, focusing resources on opportunities with a high probability of success.</em></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td><strong>‚ö†Ô∏è Risk & Assumption Analysis</strong></td>
      <td>Proactively identifies and flags potential risks related to logistics, timelines, compliance, and financial clauses (e.g., option clauses).</td>
      <td><em>Transforms the report from a simple summary into a strategic decision-support tool, minimizing downstream surprises.</em></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td><strong>üßë‚Äçüíª Human-in-the-Loop Verification</strong></td>
      <td>Mandates user verification for critical compliance and standards checks before a report can be finalized, ensuring full accountability.</td>
      <td><em>Builds confidence and mitigates risk by combining AI speed with expert human judgment.</em></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td><strong>üí∞ Dynamic Pricing Engine</strong></td>
      <td>Calculates a full bid value breakdown, including material costs, logistics (based on distance), testing, brokerage, and GST.</td>
      <td><em>Accelerates the pricing process from days to minutes, while providing a transparent, auditable cost structure.</em></td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Technology Stack

-   **Frontend:** React, TypeScript, Vite
-   **Styling:** Tailwind CSS
-   **AI Engine:** Google Gemini API (`gemini-3-pro-preview`)
-   **Document Parsing:** [PDF.js](https://mozilla.github.io/pdf.js/) for client-side PDF text extraction.

---

## üöÄ Local Development Setup

To run this project locally, follow these steps:

1.  **Clone the repository:**
    ```bash
    git clone <repository-url>
    cd <repository-directory>
    ```

2.  **Install dependencies:**
    Make sure you have [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/) (version 18 or higher) installed. Then run:
    ```bash
    npm install
    ```

3.  **Set up your environment variables:**
    -   Create a new file named `.env` in the root of the project.
    -   Add your Google Gemini API key to this file:
    ```
    VITE_API_KEY="YOUR_GEMINI_API_KEY"
    ```

4.  **Start the development server:**
    ```bash
    npm run dev
    ```
    The application will now be running on `http://localhost:5173` (or the next available port).

---

## üì¶ Build & Deployment

1.  **Build for Production:**
    To create an optimized production build, run the following command:
    ```bash
    npm run build
    ```
    This will generate a `dist/` directory containing all the static assets for your application.

2.  **Deploy:**
    You can deploy the contents of the `dist/` directory to any static web hosting service, such as:
    -   Vercel
    -   Netlify
    -   GitHub Pages
    -   Firebase Hosting

---

## üèóÔ∏è System Architecture: The Agent Pipeline

TenderFlow operates on a sequential pipeline where the output of one agent becomes the input for the next, creating a rich, contextual analysis.

```mermaid
graph TD
    A[üìÑ RFP Document <br/> (PDF, URL, Text)] --> B{EXTRACTOR AGENT};
    B -- Raw Text --> C{PARSING ENGINE <br/> (Gemini AI)};
    C -- Structured JSON Data --> D{SALES AGENT};
    D -- Eligibility Analysis --> E{TECHNICAL AGENT};
    E -- SKU Matching & Standards Check --> F{PRICING AGENT};
    F -- Pricing & Risk Analysis --> G{FINALIZING AGENT};
    G -- Compiled Report --> H[‚úÖ ANALYSIS REPORT UI <br/> (Human Verification)];
```
